column4: Hi, can someone help me with Gnomebaker? I'm trying to burn an audio CD and it tells me it doesn't have the plugin for it.

sorry, i use k3b (about the only kde app i like)
if you don't mind the extra libraries, sudo apt-get install k3b should do the trick
I downloaded k3b, but it says Unsupported Format
try it, i don't remember if it's on a restricted source though
what about k3b-mp3 if that doesn't work
